product_name: Merrell Traveler Tilt Slide Sandals - Men's
long_description: The men's Merrell Traveler Tilt Slide Sandals equip you for exploring on or off road with their dependable traction, solid support and comfortable cushioning. M Select Move footframe gives you an ideal combination of natural flex, contoured support and performance cushioning for all-day comfort. Footbeds and breathable mesh lining are treated with M Select Fresh odor control to help keep the sandals smelling fresh. Molded nylon arch shanks provide good support. Merrell air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. Merrell Traveler Tilt Slide Sandals have outsoles that are tuned for good traction when you need it.
short_description: The men's Merrell Traveler Tilt Slide Sandals equip you for exploring on or off road with their dependable traction, solid support and comfortable cushioning.
